snippet: On his 66th birthday Mr. Bowie announced that he had released a new single, "Where Are We Now?", in advance of "The Next Day," his first studio album in a decade.
abstract: On his 66th birthday Mr. Bowie announced that he had released a new single, "Where Are We Now?", in advance of "The Next Day," his first studio album in a decade.

headline.main: Hang On to Yourself: New Album Coming From David Bowie
headline.print_headline: David Bowie Readies a New Album
